thread.title: Gorgeous hotel with corresponding views of Eiffel
thread.title_full: Gorgeous hotel with corresponding views of Eiffel - Review of Shangri-La Hotel Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: m3gotten
title: Gorgeous hotel with corresponding views of Eiffel
text:
We stayed in a deluxe suite with mezzanine floor and separate lounge dining for a family of 5 with an adjoining room. Large french doors open to a private balcony over the front of the hotel. Wonderful staff as expected of Shangri La.
It really is a spectacular hotel with corresponding sumptuous decor reflecting the classic building although not really to my taste, as I prefer the The Shard style.
Would suit honeymooners and romantic couples. Great restaurant next door called Monsieur Bleu. Pricey breakfast even for Parisian standards.
